item.title: Personal information
item.description:
About This Page

This page contains Widodo’s informal information, which you do not want to know. Or… do you?

About Me

I enjoy learning and exploring new stuffs, including new devices and technologies. I also love troubleshooting and fixing problems around me (excluding social problems :D). I spend my free time on learning new kanjis and creating interesting stuffs like DIY electronic devices, plastic models, and programs. I also love to play simulation and Real Time Strategies (RTS) games like SimCity, Age of Empires, Command and Conquer series, etc.

item.title: Widodo's resume
item.description:
Resume of Ryan Nathanael Soenjoto Widodo, Ph.D.

Last updated on: January 23, 2025

About Me

A highly skilled Data Engineer with a PhD in Computer Science, specializing in big data storage and processing, data reduction schemes, and non-volatile memory. Over 2 years of hands-on experience in building scalable data pipelines using advanced ETL tools and cloud environments. Adept at leveraging academic research to develop innovative solutions that enhance data efficiency and performance. Eager to apply his extensive knowledge and technical skills to solve complex data challenges in a dynamic environment.
